name: Generator
description: Generators are the life force of the planet, representing approximately 37% of the population. They have a defined Sacral Center, which gives them consistent access to life force energy for work and creation. Their aura is open and enveloping, drawing life toward them.
auraDescription: The Generator's aura is like a warm embrace that draws experiences and people toward them. It's designed to attract the right opportunities for response.
role: To master what they love through committed response
gifts: Sustainable life force energy for work they love
Deep capacity for mastery through commitment
Natural magnetism that draws opportunities
Ability to know what's correct through gut response
Power to sustain and build over time
challenges: Initiating rather than waiting to respond
Saying yes when the gut says no
Quitting before achieving mastery
Feeling stuck or frustrated when not responding correctly
Giving away energy to things that don't light them up
notSelfBehavior: When Generators initiate rather than respond, or say yes to things their Sacral doesn't genuinely respond to, they experience frustration. This can manifest as feeling stuck, exhausted, or trapped in situations that drain rather than fulfill them.
signatureBehavior: When living correctly, Generators experience deep satisfaction in their work and life. They feel energized by what they do, experience mastery and flow, and go to bed tired but fulfilled.
practicalGuidance: Pay attention to your gut response - the 'uh-huh' (yes) and 'uhn-uhn' (no) sounds. Wait for something in your environment to respond to before taking action. Notice what lights you up and what drains you.

name: Manifesting Generator
description: Manifesting Generators combine the sustainable energy of Generators with a connection to the Throat Center that allows them to initiate and manifest. They make up about 33% of the population. They are multi-passionate beings designed to move quickly and efficiently.
auraDescription: Like pure Generators, MGs have an open, enveloping aura that draws life toward them. However, their connection to manifestation adds a dynamic quality that can move energy more quickly.
role: To find shortcuts and efficient paths while mastering multiple passions
gifts: Ability to do multiple things simultaneously
Finding faster, more efficient ways to accomplish goals
Sustainable energy combined with manifestation power
Quick learning and adaptation
Natural ability to skip unnecessary steps
challenges: Skipping steps that are actually necessary
Starting many things without completing them
Moving too fast for others to follow
Impatience with slower processes
Not informing others before taking action
notSelfBehavior: When MGs initiate without responding, or fail to inform others of their actions, they experience both frustration and anger. They may feel trapped, misunderstood, or constantly starting over.
signatureBehavior: When living correctly, MGs experience satisfaction through efficiently pursuing multiple passions. They find joy in the dance of responding, informing, and then acting on what lights them up.
practicalGuidance: Wait to respond like a Generator, but also inform others before you act (like a Manifestor). Embrace your multi-passionate nature - you don't have to choose just one thing. Trust your ability to skip steps, but verify with your Sacral response.

name: Projector
description: Projectors are the guides and advisors of humanity, making up about 20% of the population. They have no consistent access to Sacral energy, making them non-energy types. Their genius lies in understanding and guiding others' energy rather than doing the work themselves.
auraDescription: The Projector's aura is penetrating and focused, designed to see deeply into others. It can feel intense to those being 'seen' but offers profound insight and recognition.
role: To guide and direct the energy of others when recognized and invited
gifts: Deep capacity to see and understand others
Natural wisdom about systems and efficiency
Ability to guide energy for optimal results
Insight into the talents and potential of others
Mastery through studying rather than doing
challenges: Giving advice without being invited
Working like a Generator and burning out
Not being recognized for their gifts
Bitterness when contributions aren't valued
Over-identifying with what they absorb from others
notSelfBehavior: When Projectors push their guidance on others without invitation, or try to work like Generators, they become bitter. They may feel unseen, unappreciated, and exhausted from trying to prove their value.
signatureBehavior: When living correctly, Projectors experience success - being recognized, invited, and valued for their guidance. They feel fulfilled when their insights make a difference and their wisdom is appreciated.
practicalGuidance: Study what fascinates you and become an expert. Wait for recognition and invitation before offering guidance, especially in big life areas (career, relationships, where to live). Rest frequently and don't try to keep up with Generator energy.

name: Manifestor
description: Manifestors are the initiators of humanity, making up only about 8% of the population. They have a defined Throat Center with a motor connection, giving them the unique ability to initiate and make things happen independently. They are designed to have impact.
auraDescription: The Manifestor's aura is closed and can feel pushing or repelling to others. This is not personal - it's designed to give them the space and independence they need to initiate.
role: To initiate and have impact while informing those affected
gifts: Ability to initiate and start new things
Natural capacity to have impact
Independence and self-sufficiency
Power to catalyze change
Freedom to act on creative urges
challenges: Feeling controlled or constrained by others
Forgetting to inform and facing resistance
Being perceived as angry or intimidating
Struggling with collaboration and teamwork
Managing the impact they have on others
notSelfBehavior: When Manifestors don't inform others before acting, they encounter resistance and anger. They may feel controlled, trapped, or constantly in conflict with those around them.
signatureBehavior: When living correctly, Manifestors experience peace. They inform those who will be impacted, receive the space they need, and feel the freedom to initiate and create impact.
practicalGuidance: Inform others before you act - not asking permission, but letting them know what you're going to do. This simple practice eliminates most of the resistance you encounter. Honor your need for independence and alone time.

name: Reflector
description: Reflectors are the rarest type, making up only about 1% of the population. They have no defined centers, making them completely open to conditioning and deeply connected to the lunar cycle. They are the mirrors of society, sampling and reflecting the health of their communities.
auraDescription: The Reflector's aura is resistant and sampling - it takes in and reflects the energy around them while maintaining a protective quality. They taste everything but are not defined by anything.
role: To mirror and evaluate the health of their community
gifts: Ability to sample and reflect all energies
Deep wisdom about community health
Objectivity and fairness in evaluation
Sensitivity to environment and people
Potential for profound wisdom about human nature
challenges: Not knowing who they truly are
Taking in unhealthy environments
Making decisions too quickly
Identifying with conditioning rather than their true nature
Finding the right community and environment
notSelfBehavior: When Reflectors make decisions too quickly or live in unhealthy environments, they experience deep disappointment. They may feel invisible, lost, or like they don't belong anywhere.
signatureBehavior: When living correctly, Reflectors experience surprise - the wonder and delight of life's variety. They feel valued as wise evaluators and enjoy the ever-changing nature of their experience.
practicalGuidance: Wait a full lunar cycle (28-29 days) for major decisions. Pay close attention to your environment - you need to be around healthy people and places. Find trusted others to talk through decisions with over time. Honor your need to be different each day.
